title: Multistakeholder platforms as a best practice for supporting sustainable agriculture...

tasks.task: Presenting at a conference on sustainable agriculture and multi-stakeholder platforms for food systems.
subtasks: Identifying the role of physicists in understanding complex systems relevant to sustainability.
Discussing the importance of externalities in pricing and their impact on food systems.
Addressing the significance of smallholder farmers in global food production and strategies to enhance their productivity.
Highlighting cultural practices and traditional knowledge in sustainable land management.
Emphasizing the role of social and environmental sustainability in food systems.
Addressing the challenge of internalizing externalities through economic incentives and policy measures.
Highlighting the importance of consumer engagement and responsibility in shaping food systems.
Discussing the integration of science and technological innovations for smallholder farmers.
Raising awareness about measuring and valuing the benefits of sustainable agricultural practices.
Addressing the complexity of agricultural policies and the role of government in promoting sustainability.
Discussing water financing challenges for small-scale farmers in arid regions.
